services.title: How I can help you
services.card1_text: Get your Salesforce ready to go. Perfectly tailored to your needs, without unnecessary frills.
services.card2_text: Need something special? I build custom apps and functions that do exactly what your team needs.
services.card3_text: Old Excel spreadsheets and systems? No problem! I'll move all your data safely and cleanly into Salesforce.
services.card4_text: Let the technology work for you! Automatic follow-ups, emails, and workflows, giving you more time for the important things.
services.card5_text: Finally understand what's going on! Simple dashboards show you where you stand and where you're headed.
services.card6_text: Your team will learn to love Salesforce! Practical training that really offers value.

projects.title: Real-world Projects
projects.intro: Every company is unique, with its own processes, systems, and goals. That's exactly what makes every project exciting. Here's a glimpse of how I've helped teams not only introduce Salesforce but make it the heart of their success. From the first idea to ongoing operations.
projects.card1_text: Together we centralized the entire customer support, automated manual tasks, and created transparency through meaningful reports.
projects.card1_li1: 40% shorter creation time thanks to lean case creation
projects.card1_li2: Self-Service Knowledge Base that noticeably relieves the support team
projects.card1_li3: Voicebot integration that answers frequent questions lightning-fast and never sleeps.
projects.card2_title: Migration from Salesforce Classic to Lightning
projects.card2_text: The entire Salesforce environment was modernized. Objects, workflows, and custom code were migrated to Lightning, making daily work much more intuitive.
projects.card2_li1: Modernization of flexible Lightning architecture for future extensions
projects.card2_li2: Intuitive Lightning Pages for faster navigation
projects.card2_li3: Migration of S-Controls, Apex, and Process Builder to Flows for sustainable automation
projects.card3_text: The entire contract creation process was automated. Contracts are now generated, checked, and sent directly from Salesforce.
projects.card3_li2: Automatic adaptation to cantonal requirements for error-free processes
projects.card3_li3: Secure and traceable filing in the internal database without data loss

skills.title: Why work with me?
skills.text1: Since 2016, everything for me has revolved around Salesforce. No buzzwords, but with a clear understanding of the challenges of your customer service employees.
skills.text2: I accompany you from the first idea to go-live. And afterwards too. Because a CRM only unfolds its real value when people like working with it, simply and securely.
skills.skill1_desc: Efficient setup, user management, and ongoing maintenance of your Salesforce environment.
skills.skill2_desc: Scalable system architecture focusing on performance, security, and extensibility.
skills.skill3_desc: Automation of your business processes with Flows, Approval Processes, and custom logic.
skills.skill4_desc: Structured data maintenance, migration concepts, and clean data models for better insights.

contact.text: Up for a Salesforce that fits your business? Call me, write me, or let's talk over coffee. Costs nothing* and gets you further!
